column1: The task of this Court in  the backdrop of the above arguments primarily
becomes three fold. This Court has to first go into the question whether it

column2: has jurisdiction to go into the matter in  its hand!. If this Court answers that

column1: question in  the affirmative, then this Court has to embark on  the second
task of ascertaining whether the Petitioners have the requisite  locus standi
